availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married Susannah Beckham Pedigo in 1854.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 99. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 38. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Marriages, Warren County, 1854. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Rocky Hill, p. 26. “George Pedigo,” Find A Grave, May 2, 2014, Memorial no. 129013972.
